add_module()

Create a module

add_rconnect_file()

Add an app.R at the root of your package to deploy on RStudio Connect

att_from_description()

Return all package dependencies from current package

browser_button()

Insert an hidden browser button

create_shiny_template()

Create a package for Shiny App

detach_all_attached()

Detach all attached package

Document and reload your package

favicon()

Add favicon to your app

fill_desc()

Fill your description

get_dependencies()

Return all package dependencies from current package

golem

A package for building Shiny App

js()

Add JS code Straight to your app (instead of a dependency)

Functions already made dev devependant

app_prod() app_dev()
